thread.title: Super Bowl result has eerie parallels with the 2016 US election
thread.title_full: Super Bowl result has eerie parallels with the 2016 US election

author: Helena Horton
title: Super Bowl result has eerie parallels with the 2016 US election
text:
Super Bowl result has eerie parallels with the 2016 US election It was pointed out by many on social media Credit: Wall Street Journal/Twitter Helena Horton 6 February 2017 â€¢ 6:48am 
T here was a clear winner from the beginning, and it seemed the competition was over before it had really started. 
Then, out of the blue, the underdog surged ahead and won. 
It's no surprise many on social media noticed the parallels between this year's Super Bowl and the 2016 election. 
There were many photoshopped images of Hillary Clinton dressed in the Atlanta Falcons uniform making the rounds on Twitter. 
Here are some of the best jokes about the parallels between the two results. Hillary quite suits the Atlanta Falcons kit â€” LA Hero (@la_gringo) 6 February 2017 Did they win the popular vote? Breaking news: The Atlanta Falcons won the popular vote. #SuperBowl â€” Jeff Ross (@realjeffreyross) 6 February 2017 The Falcons had a similar chance of winning to Hillary Clinton â€” Leah the Boss (@LeahRBoss) 6 February 2017 Donald Trump fans were very excited about it â€” Brittany Pettibone (@BrittPettibone) 6 February 2017 The story was told again through the medium of sport This game is almost like the 2016 election...we thought we had a clear winner until...well, you know the rest. Lol #SuperBowl â€” Ralph M. (@RalphM07) February 6, 2017 It made some feel stressed 
I magine being a supporter of both Hillary Clinton and the Falcons... OMG! It's election night all over again. #SuperBowl pic.twitter.com/RN6bvZ8QYq Can we even predict results anymore? I haven't seen a lead blown this bad since Hillary lost the election. ðŸ˜‚ #SuperBowl â€” Bubba Ray Dudley (@bullyray5150) February 6, 2017 People can't believe it happened This #SuperBowl is strikingly similar to the 2016 election. I cannot believe what just happened. â€” Asa J ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ (@asamjulian) February 6, 2017 But the two results really were strikingly similar â€” Mark Di Stefano (@MarkDiStef) February 6, 2017 Watch | Super Bowl LI haircare advert pokes fun at Trump 00:32 Follow the latest Telegraph American Football news READ MORE ABOUT:
